00019 DescEditor::DescEditor(QWidget* parent /* = 0 */) : QGroupBox(parent), m_descEdit(0)
00020 {
00021     setTitle(tr("Description"));
00022 
00023     // Add the text edit to the group box.
00024     QVBoxLayout* layout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00025 
00026     m_descEdit = new QPlainTextEdit();
00027     layout->addWidget(m_descEdit);
00028 
00029     // Connect the signals informing of changes in items.
00030     connect(m_descEdit, SIGNAL(textChanged()),
00031             this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00032 }

00045 {

00047 }

00049 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00050 // Function: getDescription()
00051 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00052 QString DescEditor::getDescription() const
00053 {
